headline: Analytics stack for omnichannel retailers and brands
description:
42 is an end-to-end analytics stack for DTC and wholesale brands.

Our platform shows you the right insights and data, anytime you need them:
- Hundreds of built-in metrics across Stores, eComm, Wholesale, or any other channel
- See all your sales, stock and customer in one report, with images
- Accurate cost, markdown and promo reporting
- Get answers in real-time, during your buyer / supplier meetings
- Get your store managers to use data, we've seen 10% margin increases from this
- Actually know how much stock you have.

We're more than just a dashboard...
- No infrastructure needed. We do the hosting and maintenance.
- No integrations (for you). We do the heavy-lifting and get your data into 42
- For brands, we work with all the major retailers (via xlsx, portals or EDI)
- For retailers, we can be your vendor portal
- We integrate with any system
- We work with you to tailor the analytics according to your products and naming

Our customers include AllSaints, Frasers Group, Incipio Group, Bandier, Deconic... and way more.

If you want to learn more about what we do, head over to our website: 42technologies.com
... or go to any AllSaints store and ask a store manager :)

# Clunky, canned reportingis so last season
Leading merchants trust 42 to deliver immediate, accurate retail reporting. Our dashboard processes real-time data from every channel, including ecom, brick-and-mortar, wholesale, marketplaces and more.
[Let's talk shop](https://42technologies.com/</request-demo>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/1080x728/f2e5b1ebd2/dashboard-overview.svg)

## 42 is the universal source oftruth for your business
No more ad hoc reports. No more formula maintenance. No more manual manipulation. No more Excel. No more reliance on an IT team. Just fast, easy answers, all in one place.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27808%27%20height=%27444%27/%3e)![](https://42technologies.com)
Why don't my numbers match up with your numbers
I'm still waiting on that report from IT
I'm stuck building the same reports every Monday
How can I get my suppliers to optimize their inventory for us
There's too many sources and excel keeps crashing on me
## Made for retail experts,  by retail (and data!) experts
### All of the data,none of the digging
Our fully-customizable dashboard lets you drill down into your data with a few clicks. 42 offers built-in retail metrics, visualizations, goal-tracking, NRF calendars, multiple product or store hierarchies, currencies, and much more! Less Excelling, more selling.
[Learn more](https://42technologies.com/</platform>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/615x534/91fb119c6f/group-3239-1.svg)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/953x1021/1f56d38ebb/group-3241.svg)
### Lots of systems? No problem
Our data engineering team works with you to understand your reporting needs. We design integrations and build a dashboard that works for you — no matter what systems you use.
[Learn more](https://42technologies.com/</integrations>)
### Clear, clean reports for all
With accurate, real-time data for your executives, merchandisers, sales team, and store managers – and the ability to send automated reports — you can take back your Monday mornings.
[Learn more](https://42technologies.com/</platform>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/624x496/8b945ed575/group-3234-2.svg)
### Unparalleled product intelligence powers your next move
Designed specifically for retail, 42 gives merchants everything you need — from data mapping to data warehouse hosting and mobile-friendly visuals that the whole team wants to use.
[Let's talk shop](https://42technologies.com/</request-demo>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/593x544/b8cdacd377/top-selling-jumpers.svg)
#### See how fast-growing brands use 42...
## It feels good to be loved
![Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/x/a1a3dc2672/logo-herve-leger.svg)
42 saves time, and it has everything. I can go back to like 2019 and still see sales. If I want to pull that out of Shopify, I have to pull 10 different reports because of how much data is housed in there and how slow it is.
![Photo](https://42technologies.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F153220%2F100x100%2F916bebceea%2Fmegan.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
Senior Merchandise Manager, Megan Costello
![Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/300x129/444a624f19/doen-01.svg)
The easiest thing about starting with 42 was how user-friendly it is, and how quickly you could get up to speed. I literally just think about what I want to know and then I drag and drop the bubbles.
![Photo](https://42technologies.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F153220%2F100x100%2F28adc61dce%2Fkristina.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
VP of Merchandising & Planning, Kristina Shiroka
![Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/300x129/83e1902e1c/andie-01.svg)
Even if we do just a three-month pop-up, we can easily add a new location and track that shop’s sales with our other sales.
![Photo](https://42technologies.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F153220%2F100x100%2F97f2c81d4e%2Fsara-t.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
Senior Director of Merchandising, Sarah Tarika
![Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/153220/x/a1a3dc2672/logo-herve-leger.svg)
42 saves time, and it has everything. I can go back to like 2019 and still see sales. If I want to pull that out of Shopify, I have to pull 10 different reports because of how much data is housed in there and how slow it is.
![Photo](https://42technologies.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F153220%2F100x100%2F916bebceea%2Fmegan.jpeg&w=96&q=75)

![Logo⟨19⟩]
42 saves time, and it has everything. I can go back to like 2019 and still see sales. If I want to pull that out of Shopify, I have to pull 10 different reports because of how much data is housed in there and how slow it is.
![Photo⟨20⟩]
Senior Merchandise Manager, Megan Costello
![Logo⟨21⟩]
The easiest thing about starting with 42 was how user-friendly it is, and how quickly you could get up to speed. I literally just think about what I want to know and then I drag and drop the bubbles.
![Photo⟨22⟩]
VP of Merchandising & Planning, Kristina Shiroka
![Arrow Left⟨25⟩]
![Arrow Right⟨26⟩]

generated_description:
### Meet 42 Technologies

42 Technologies is a smart choice for retailers and brands striving to harness the power of data. Founded in 2014 and part of Y Combinator’s W14 batch, this San Francisco-based company offers an *end-to-end analytics stack* tailor-made for direct-to-consumer (DTC) and wholesale brands.

#### What They Do: 
The cornerstone of 42's offering is its robust analytics platform designed for *omnichannel* performance. With a variety of built-in metrics covering diverse channels like retail stores, eCommerce, and wholesale, users can access comprehensive reports that include sales, stock, and customer data—all in one place and in real time. 

Here’s a snapshot of what 42 delivers:
- **Real-Time Insights:** Get the data you need when you need it, especially useful during buyer/supplier meetings.
- **Unified Reporting:** No more juggling multiple reports—everything you need is visually represented and easily accessible.
- **Margin Results:** Teams that engage with data through 42 have seen an increase in profit margins of up to 10%.
- **Stock Management:** Users can effortlessly track their inventory levels.

#### Going Beyond Dashboards:
42 isn’t just another analytics dashboard. Here’s what sets it apart:
- **No Infrastructure Woes:** Clients don’t have to worry about hosting or maintenance; 42 takes care of that.
- **Data Integration Made Easy:** Whether brands work with major retailers, EDI, or various portals, 42 handles the data connections smoothly.
- **Tailored Analytics:** Their team collaborates with clients to create custom analytics that align with specific business needs.

#### Who Uses 42?
Their clientele features notable names like AllSaints, Frasers Group, Incipio Group, and Bandier, showcasing their capability in serving diverse retail narratives.

#### Why Choose 42?
- **User-Centric Design:** The platform is built for retail experts, and its intuitive interface allows for quick onboarding and a seamless experience.
- **Deep Data Dive:** Customizable dashboards empower users to dig into data insights without needing IT support or manual data management.
- **Holistic Understanding:** 42 provides clarity not just in sales, but across multiple performance factors, enabling smarter business decisions.

With its commitment to delivering accurate, real-time retail reporting in a user-friendly format, 42 is redefining how businesses interact with their data. If you want to explore what they can do for you, check them out at [42technologies.com](https://42technologies.com) or visit an AllSaints store and chat with the management. 

Welcome to the future of retail analytics—42 Technologies.
